gemini_mi: Ní roib dream ar bith táinig riamh d'Éirinn ba cháirdeamhla ná na Fomoire. Lochlannaigh agus Innsigh Gall do mhaoidh araon go roib na gaiscígh ba thréine acú sa turus sin.
English_sentence: No group that ever came to Ireland was more friendly than the Fomoire. People from Lochlainn and the Hebrides both claimed they had the strongest warriors in that journey.

gemini_mi: Ní fétad in Dagda na bá ro gabtha la Fomoirib d'athgabáil. Do-bert-som in n-ailbech immaig do rathad dó i lóg, do chobair. In tan ro gáirastar ar a laogh, táncatar na bá uile ro gabtha la Fomoirib arís ocus ro gabsat oc inilt arís.
English_sentence: The Dagda could not get back the cattle that the Fomoire had taken. He used the heifer instead that was given to him as a reward, to help. When she called out for her calf, all the cows stolen by the Fomoire came back and started grazing again.

gemini_mi: An fil ní do-ghlanfadh d'ainm, a Bhres? ar Lug. Fil. Fíastar dóibh, do-bhéar tecosc do na breitheamhnaibh cionnus maoin do mhéadughadh gan cháin do gabháil.

Rather than fishing, he reads the currents beneath the sea, claiming they are the spirits of Tethraâs lost kin found roaming across the deep like wandering cattle of an ancient plain.'
